Class AbstractPickHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.piccolo.event.PBasicInputEventHandler
      • ca.nengo.ui.lib.world.handlers.AbstractPickHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.umd.cs.piccolo.event.PInputEventListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TooltipPickHandler

    public abstract class AbstractPickHandler
extends edu.umd.cs.piccolo.event.PBasicInputEventHandler
    Abstract handler which picks and unpicks nodes with a delay
